text: He paigambara! Jevha imana rakhanarya striya tumacyasi ya gostinvara bai'ata (pratijna) karanyasathi yetila ki tya allahasobata dusarya konala sahabhagi banavinara nahita, cori karanara nahita, vyabhicara karanara nahita, apalya santatici hatya karanara nahita ani na asa ekhada aksepa thevatila jo svatah apalya hata-payansamora racuna ghyava ani ekhadya nekicya kamata tumaci avajna karanara nahita tara tumhi tyancyakaduna bai'ata karuna gheta ja ani tyancyasathi allahakade ksama-yacana kara. Nihsansaya, allaha motha mapha karanara dayavana ahe
